testcase.name: search products by name
testcase.system-out: Given go to odoo, log in and go to purcases.................................passed Given user is on odoo purchases/products module.............................passed When user enters a word "apple" into a search box...........................passed Then system should display results that contain the word "apple"............passed And a small tab with the word "apple" appears in the search box.............passed

testcase.name: display/hide advanced search option
testcase.system-out: Given go to odoo, log in and go to purcases.................................passed Given user clicks on the search icon........................................passed Then advanced search options should display.................................passed When user clicks on the search icon again...................................passed Then advanced search options should disapear................................passed
